data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Every morning, Will waits for a bus. The ____ takes ____ to ____. The ____ stops ____ the ____ near ____ house; it ____ very ____ for ____. The ____ travels ____ the ____, ____ it ____ near ____ work ____. It is slower to go on the bus than to drive in a car, but Will likes the bus more.
data.partBlankContent: Every morning, Will waits for a bus. The b__ takes h__ to wo__. The b__ stops o_ the str___ near h__ house; it i_ very ea__ for h__. The b__ travels t_ the ci__, a__ it st___ near h__ work pl___. It is slower to go on the bus than to drive in a car, but Will likes the bus more.
data.answer: 每天早上，威尔等公共汽车。他乘公共汽车去上班。公共汽车停在他家附近的街道上，这对他来说很容易。公共汽车开到城里，在他工作的地方附近停。坐公共汽车比开车慢，但是威尔更喜欢公共汽车。
